data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was collected, analyte type, tumor status, histological type of sample, primary tumor location, sample associated with primary or metastatic tumor, sequence center, tissue type, protocol of library construction, protocol of total RNA extraction of participants with breast cancer and involved in the "Sequence-Based Analysis of Human Breast Tumors" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: PRIMARY_METASTATIC_TUMOR
variable.description: Primary tumor, metastasis, or transformed cell line

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing

variable.name: TISSUE_TYPE
variable.description: Type of tissues to extract total RNA for library construction

variable.name: LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL
variable.description: Protocols to remove rRNA from sequencing library
